resources.string: How friendly was the service? Enter a number from 1 (least friendly) to 5 (friendliest).
How fast was the service for this kind of restaurant? Enter a number from 1 (slowest) to 5 (fastest).
How good was the food? Enter a number from 1 (worst) to 5 (best).
How generous are you? Enter a number from 1 (most selfish) to 5 (most generous).
How much of a tip can you afford to pay? Enter a number from 1 (least) to 5 (most).
